should work for
should return undefined if not called with any arguments
removes all unsupported props and leaves others, including stroke props
tests.code:
it("removes all unsupported props and leaves others, including stroke props", () => {
    expect(NativeHelpers.getStyle({
      fill: "black",
      stroke: "grey",
      pointerEvents: "auto",
      x: 0,
      y: 0,
      _x: 0,
      _y: 0,
      userSelect: "none",
      strokeWidth: 1,
      strokeOpacity: 1,
      strokeDasharray: 1,
      strokeDashoffset: 1,
      strokeLinecap: 1,
      strokeLinejoin: 1
    })).toEqual({
      fill: "black",
      stroke: "grey",
      strokeWidth: 1,
      strokeOpacity: 1,
      strokeDasharray: 1,
      strokeDashoffset: 1,
      strokeLinecap: 1,
      strokeLinejoin: 1
    });
  });
